sentences.sContent: He will be particularly discomfited by the governor's dismissal of his plan.
sentences.sCn: 州长撤下他计划将让他尤其难堪。

sentences.sContent: The solemn intensity of Jade's gaze discomfited him.
sentences.sCn: 在杰德强烈而严肃的凝视下他狼狈不堪。

synos.tran: 挫败；扰乱，破坏；使…为难；使…破灭

remMethod.val: dis (不) + com (来) + fit (合适) → 来了却不合适， 还不如不来 → 扰乱

trans.tranCn: 挫败；扰乱，破坏；使…为难；使…破灭
trans.tranOther: If you are discomfited by something, it causes you to feel slightly embarrassed or confused
